jobDescription: Job Description: Data Analyst  The Data Analyst will be part of a team responsible for the collection, mining and presentation of operational and engineering data on a daily basis. Data will be used by upper management for making business critical decisions. The Data Analyst will also be responsible for reporting and improvement initiatives that will support his or her growth while enabling the company to achieve its strategic objectives.  Day to Day activities The Data Specialist Individual tasks include: Accuracy and maintenance of project data  Presentation of operational data  Develop and demonstrate a solid understanding of the drivers behind the data.  Provide timely reports that support the Budgeting & Forecasting process.  Participate in special projects by supporting management and the project teams in various tasks  Be responsible for the accuracy, timeliness and presentation of daily reports to upper management and decision makers.  Report automation and streamlining the current data load and reporting process  Prepare ad-hoc reports and initial data analysis as requested  Key Competencies  Ability to work independently (with limited supervision) and possesses the initiative to identify problems and propose creative solutions.  Must be a formidable team player, highly motivated, and eager to learn.  Strong computer skills, Power Point and Excel a Must, especially Pivot Tables!  Excellent oral and written communication skills
